banner.title: Create mocks in JSON generated by AI.
banner.description: Get JSON data on any topic with just one instruction. Start getting information easily.

form.title: Set your structure, start creating mocks in JSON.
form.description: You can define the fields of your object to return exactly the same from AI.
form.subtitle: You can select one of the example formats below.

types.title: Convert types to JSON mocks for testing your applications.
types.description: You can pass your types code and get a mock as you desire with AI.

examples.title: Some examples
examples.description: You can see more examples. Select one of the following items to see more details.

NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.description: Sorry, it seems like the page you are looking for does not exist. Don't worry, you can go back to the home page!

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.instructionModel: Choose the model you want to use to generate the JSON. You need to add the corresponding API KEY for the selected model to use it.
Settings.instructionCreativity: Choose the level of creativity you want the model to have to generate the JSON.
Settings.instructionApikey: Enter the API KEY corresponding to the selected model to use it and generate the JSON.

placeholder.prompt: Most Listened musics in Hard Rock Category
placeholder.name: Name

Alerts.emptyPromptAndCount: Enter the prompt and the number of items.
Alerts.emptyModel: Please select a model and provide the API KEY.
Alerts.generateError: Error generating the JSON. Check your configuration values.
Alerts.almostThreeFields: You need at least 3 fields to generate the JSON.
